# Taking Photographs (Mode P)

This section describes how to take pictures using program AE (mode P). See pages 56â€“65 for information on S, A, and M modes.

1. Press the **DRIVE/DELETE** button and select **STILL IMAGE** in the drive-mode menu.

   !Drive/Delete Button

2. Rotate the shutter-speed dial to **P** and confirm that the camera displays shooting information for program AE.

   !Shutter-Speed Dial

3. **Check the shooting mode.**  
   Confirm that **P** appears in the display.

   !Shooting Mode Display
